data.prayer: Lord, please provide elders whose hearts are completely yours in every town in the state of Brava.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Brava, Cape Verde
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Father, move the 460 believers in the state of Brava to say "Not our will, but yours be done", like Jesus.
data.verse: He withdrew about a stone’s throw beyond them, knelt down and prayed, "Father, if you are willing, take this cup from me; yet not my will, but yours be done."

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 11 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Spirit, guide seekers in Brava, Cape Verde to the gospel through searching YouTube or TikTok today.
data.verse: I love those who love me, and those who seek me find me.

data.prayer: Spirit, make the church in Brava, Cape Verde humble and willing to hear the sometimes hard voices of prophets bringing the light of truth on them.
data.verse: So have I become your enemy by telling you the truth?

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Nova Sintra
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Nova Sintra, Brava, Cape Verde.
Lord, please give the 460 believers in the state of Brava the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that they might know you better.
data.verse: I keep asking that the God of our Lord Jesus Christ, the glorious Father, may give you the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that you may know him better.

data.prayer: Over 14.05 percent of the people of Brava are far from Jesus. Lord, please send your gospel to them through the internet or radio or television today!
Spirit, help every believer in Brava, Cape Verde be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks them for the reason for their hope.
data.verse: But in your hearts revere Christ as Lord. Always be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks you to give the reason for the hope that you have. But do this with gentleness and respect.
